attributes.description: The Suzuki Swift Is A Terrific Little Car To Drive. With It's Excellent Fuel Efficiency And Light Weight This Car Is Becoming Exceedingly Popular On South African Roads. Our 1 OWNER 2017 Model Is Presented In Silver With A Black Cloth Interior. It Has Covered ONLY 85 000 km And Retains A Full Service History, All Books And Spare Keys. Features Include Bluetooth, CD Player, USB And Auxiliary Input, Air Conditioner, Front Electric Windows, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And 14 Inch Wheels. Come And View It Today. This Quick Seller Won't Be On Our Floors For Long.Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
